commands.name: Show Network Interface
commands.description: Display specific interface details (IPv4/IPv6, MAC address, status)

commands.name: Show Network Ping
commands.description: Test network connectivity to remote host

c.description: Number of ping packets to send

commands.name: Set Network Static
commands.description: Configure static IP address for network interface

commands.name: Show Manager Info
commands.description: Display manager component status (servers, PSUs, manager info)

commands.name: Show Manager Health
commands.description: Display health status (servers, PSU, memory, temperature)

commands.name: Show Manager Version
commands.description: Display manager version information (package, rootfs, U-Boot, kernel, devicetree)

commands.name: Show Manager Scan Device
commands.description: Display rack manager system information and device scan

commands.name: Show Manager FRU
commands.description: Get FRU information of R-SCM board

commands.name: Show Manager Portmap
commands.description: Display port mapping details for RSCM connections

commands.name: Show Manager Time
commands.description: Display manager system time and date in UTC

commands.name: Show Manager Log
commands.description: Print rack manager telemetry log with filtering options

commands.name: Show Manager Powermeter Reading
commands.description: Show rack power readings (voltage, current, power)

commands.name: Show Manager Powermeter Multipolicy Active
commands.description: Show active requestor multi-policy power configuration

commands.name: Show Manager TFTP List
commands.description: List files available under TFTP location

commands.name: Show Manager SSH Status
commands.description: Display SSH cipher security configuration level

commands.name: Set Manager Time
commands.description: Set manager system time and date

commands.name: Show Manager Throttle Count Debug
commands.description: Show rack manager throttle count with debug information

commands.name: Show Manager Throttle Force
commands.description: Indicate if throttle signal is active and enabled

commands.name: Set Manager Throttle Count Clear
commands.description: Clear throttle count and reset time

commands.name: Set Manager Throttle Force Enable
commands.description: Enable or disable forced throttle signal

commands.name: Show Manager Firmware Update Status
commands.description: Show most recent firmware update status

commands.name: Show Manager Firmware Update List
commands.description: List available rack manager firmware packages for recovery

commands.name: Show Manager Health Monitor Log
commands.description: Display logs collected by RM health monitoring

commands.name: Show Manager IPTables Profiles
commands.description: Display list of configurable firewall profiles

commands.name: Show Manager Rsyslog
commands.description: Display current external server for rsyslog streaming

commands.name: Set Manager IPTables Bulk Add
commands.description: Bulk add iptables rules from file

commands.name: Set Manager Rsyslog
commands.description: Configure external server for rsyslog streaming

commands.name: Show System Health
commands.description: Get server health information including PCIe

commands.name: Show System State
commands.description: Get server ON/OFF state and datasafe status

commands.name: Show System Default Power
commands.description: Get default power state (ON/OFF) for server

commands.name: Show System Power Limit
commands.description: Show power limit configuration for server

commands.name: Show System Power Reading
commands.description: Get current power consumption for server

commands.name: Set System Power Alert
commands.description: Configure power alert policy for server

commands.name: Set System Power Limit On
commands.description: Activate power limit and enable throttling

commands.name: Set System Power Limit Off
commands.description: Deactivate power limit and disable throttling

commands.name: Set System On
commands.description: Soft power server ON (supply power to chipset)

commands.name: Set System Off
commands.description: Soft power server OFF (remove power from chipset)

commands.name: Set System Reset
commands.description: Power cycle or soft reset server

commands.name: Set System Default Power On
commands.description: Set default power state to ON

commands.name: Set System Default Power Off
commands.description: Set default power state to OFF

commands.name: Show System FPGA Temp
commands.description: Get system FPGA temperature in Celsius

commands.name: Show System Boot
commands.description: Get pending boot order for next boot

commands.name: Show System BIOS Code
commands.description: Get BIOS POST code for server

commands.name: Set System Boot
commands.description: Set boot device type for next boot

t.description: Boot type (none, pxe, disk, bios, remotedrive, emmc, usb, netunlock)

commands.name: Set System BIOS Config
commands.description: Set BIOS configuration for next reboot

commands.name: Show System TPM Presence
commands.description: Check if TPM physical presence is set

commands.name: Set System Remote Drive Mount
commands.description: Mount ISO image as boot drive

commands.name: Set System File Get
commands.description: Get file from server to RM

commands.name: Set System File Put
commands.description: Put file to server from RM

commands.name: Show System User List
commands.description: List all users in server BMC

commands.name: Start Serial Session
commands.description: Start serial console session to server (Ctrl-X to exit)

commands.name: Stop Serial Session
commands.description: Stop serial console session to server

commands.name: Show Powershelf PSU Info
commands.description: Show PSU information (manufacturer, model, version, readings)

commands.name: Show Powershelf PSU Reading
commands.description: Show PSU parameters (voltage, current, temperature, fan speed, power)

commands.name: Show Powershelf PSU State
commands.description: Show PSU state (presence, AC status, alert)

commands.name: Show Smart Rack Health
commands.description: Show Smart IT Rack health status

commands.name: Show PCU Reading
commands.description: Show PCU power and cooling readings
